resources.string: Test your knowledge using the flashcard quiz!
Use the following menu to manage the list of flashcards in the quiz.
Tap here to delete all your flashcards.

%1$s

Try to recall the translation of the word or phrase displayed and tap \"%2$s\" button to turn over the card. Compare your answer with the one on the other side of the card and tap \"%3$s\" or \"%4$s\" button depending on the result.
<html> <head> </head> <body> <center>You have finished the flashcard quiz.</center> <center>Words recalled correctly: %1$d</center> <center>Words recalled incorrectly: %2$d</center> </body> <html/>

<html> <head> </head> <body> <center>Congratulations!</center> <center>You have finished the flashcard quiz.</center> <center>Words recalled correctly: %1$d</center> <center>Words recalled incorrectly: %2$d</center> </body> <html/>
Do you really want to quit the quiz?
Do you really want to delete all flashcards?
You do not have any flashcards to run the quiz. Please open an entry which you would like to learn and tap\n \"%1$s ###\" button.
Unfortunately you cannot run the quiz, as you have disabled all your flashcards. Please, enable them in \"%1$s\".
